text: The Sixth Sense is a 1999 American psychological horror thriller film. It is set in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania and was directed by M. Night Shyamalan. It stars Haley Joel Osment and Bruce Willis. It is the second highest-grossing horror movie of all time (behind It). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1999 drama movies Category:1999 horror movies Category:1999 thriller movies Category:1990s drama thriller movies Category:1990s horror thriller movies Category:1999 mystery movies Category:1990s ghost movies Category:1990s psychological movies Category:1990s supernatural movies Category:American drama thriller movies Category:American ghost movies Category:American mystery movies Category:American psychological movies Category:Disney movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies composed by James Newton Howard Category:Movies directed by M.
